effect.text: Give up to 1 of your leaders or characters with the (Wano Country) type +1000 Power for this turn.

meta.notes: The card's cost is printed as a large '2' in the top-left corner. The power is 0, as indicated by the '0' in the top-right corner. The rarity 'C' is printed in the bottom-right corner.
